actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating July 2, 1976, as an official holiday.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating July 2, 1976, as an official holiday. Calls upon all States to encourage individuals to participate in Bicentennial celebrations organized for the weekend of July 4, 1976.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating July 2, 1976, as an official holiday.
